text: This Chinese dialogue has some key vocabulary: computer (电脑), TV (电视), and TV program (电视节目) .小红：Xiao Ming, what will you do at home?小明：I will play computer games at home, what about you?小红：I like to watch tv at home.小明：What programs do you like to watch?小红：I like to watch sport contests. Watching basketball competitions is my favourite!小明：Then let’s watch together this weekend.
